maqras.text: Solomon said, “Soon will we see whether you have told the truth or lied
“Go with this letter of mine, and deliver it to them. Then draw back from them, and wait to see what answer they return.”
The queen said, “O you advisors, here addressed to me is a letter worthy of respect
“It is from Solomon, and it reads as follows
“Be not arrogant towards me, but come to me as a Muslim.”
She said, “O you advisors, advise me in this situation of mine, for no decision have I made, except in your presence.”
They said, “We are endued with strength, and possessors of great might, but the command is with you, so consider what you will command.”
She said, “Kings indeed, when they enter a country, ravish it, and make the most honorable of its people, its most humiliated, they do indeed
“But I am going to send him a gift, and wait to see with what answer my messenger returns.”
So when the messenger came Solomon said, “You give me riches? But that which God has given me is better than that which He has given you. No, it is you who rejoice in your gift
“Go back to them, and be sure we will come to them with such legions as they will never be able to resist. We will expel them from there in disgrace, and they will feel humbled.”
He said to his own people, “O advisors which of you can bring me her throne before they come to me as Muslim?”
Said a strong one of the jinn, “I will bring it to you before you stand from your place. Indeed I have full strength for the purpose, and can be trusted.”

Said one who had knowledge of the Book, “I will bring it to you before your sight can return to you.” Then when Solomon saw it placed before him he said, “This is allowed by my Lord, to make evident whether or not I will reject it, but if any is grateful, indeed his gratitude is for his own self. But if any rejects it, still my Lord is rich and noble, and truly my Lord is free of all needs, supreme in honor.”
He said, “Make her throne uncomfortable, we will see whether she is guided to the truth or is one of those who receive no guidance.”
So when she arrived, she was asked, “Is this your throne?” She said, “It was just like this, but knowledge was bestowed on us in advance of this, and we are Muslims.”
And he diverted her from the worship of others besides God, for she was from a people who had rejected it

She was asked to enter the lofty palace, but when she saw it, she thought it was a pool of water, and exposed her legs. He said, “This is only a palace paved smooth with glass.” She said, “My Lord, I have indeed wronged my soul, and I submit with Solomon, to the Guardian Evolver of all systems of knowledge.”
We sent to the Thamud their brother Salih saying, “Serve God.” But behold, they became two factions arguing with each other
He said, “O my people, why do you hasten on harm before good? Why do you not ask God for forgiveness, that you may receive mercy
They said, “A bad omen do we predict from you and those who are with you.” He said, “Your bad omen is with God. Yes, you are a people being tested.”
There were in the city nine people of a family, who do wrong in the land, and would not reform

They said, “Swear a mutual promise by God that we will make a secret night attack on him and his people, and that we will then say to his heir when he seeks vengeance, ‘We were not present at the slaughter of his people, and we are indeed telling the truth.’ ”
They plotted and planned, but We too planned, even while they perceived it not
So see what the end of their plot was, We caused them and their people to perish, all of them
Now their houses were in utter ruin, because they did wrong, indeed in this is a sign for people of knowledge
And We saved those who believed and practiced righteousness
We also sent Lot as a prophet. Behold, he said to his people, “Do you do what is shameful with you eyes wide open
Are you really attracted to men more than, in addition to, or instead of women?" No, but you are unaware
